reviewText: My 4 year old loves these videos. She can watch over and over and not get tired. Takes the whole "wheels on the bus" children rhyme to another level.
All these vdeos are pretty much the same thing over and over. It would be nice if it showed mor time on the theme. Like mor farm animals. I thought it Was a short time spent on the farm animals.

This review is on behalf of my 9-month-old granddaughter.  She loves Wheels on the Bus, even though she cannot yet ask for it by name, but rolls her fists round each other and we know what she means.  We also look at the book with her and she points out the different characters or objects that we name.  I think we could actually act this video out by now, but as long as she is happy so are we!
My granddaughter loves this she goes around all day singing the wheels on the bus go round and round
My granddaughter is a year old and she just loves this movie. This is the one she always picks out to watch.
My granddaughter just loves these movies. Well worth the money!
Very disappointed. I wanted a video of just wheels on the bus songs and this video had other story lines going on as well. My daughter was not impressed.
I was not that impressed with this video. My 18 month old twins didn't seem impressed either it did not hold their attention.
My kids LOVED this show on Netflix and it isn't on there any more.  So glad to find it on Amazon so we could just buy it!!
